passives.name: Giant Strength
passives.effects: Gain 50% of base attack damage as bonus attack damage.

passives.name: Lifeline
passives.effects: If you take 400 − 1800 (based on level) damage within 5 seconds, you gain a shield for up to 3.75 seconds equal to 75% bonus health, which start decaying after 0.75 seconds (60 second cooldown).

passives.name: Sterak's Fury
passives.effects: Grants increased size and +30% Tenacity for 8 seconds.
